de.dfki.embots.bml.behavior
Class BMLBehavior

java.lang.Object
  de.dfki.embots.bml.BMLElement
      de.dfki.embots.bml.behavior.BMLBehavior
All Implemented Interfaces:
BMLLexicalizedBehavior, BMLWritable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BMLNonverbalBehavior, BMLSpeechBehavior
public abstract class BMLBehavior
extends BMLElement
implements BMLWritable, BMLLexicalizedBehavior

Abstract class for behaviors like speech, gesture, head etc. Every behavior can have a number of sync points that are identified by ID. Standard sync points are start, ready, stroke_start, ... However, like in the speech tag, sync points can also have arbitrary IDs.
